column2: The Celts of Gaul were renowned for there excelent cavalry tactics and were often hired on as mercenaries. They even formed the core of the Roman Empire's cavalry regiments for several hundred years. This is where the new breed of Gaulish heavy cavalry are trained.

For quite some time now you have watched the steady decline of [Root.Religion.GetName]. No longer can you sit idly by while your people suffer at the hands of zealots and madmen of [Root.Religion.GetName]. From now on you will lead your people back to the teachings of your forefathers!

One of the following must be true:
- The ßYMoral Authorityß! of your religion must be below ßR20ß!
- There must be a pagan province in your demesne that is relevant to your culture, in addition to the ßYMoral Authorityß! of your religion being below ßR30ß!
- You must be a lunatic and the ßYMoral Authorityß! of you religion must be below ßR50ß!
Convert all characters to a not Christian and not Muslim religion, based on culture. Does not affect religious heads, so the Caliphate remains. May bring older machines to their knees.
Turn the world pagan by culture. This is mostly for development.

Do you want to turn most of the world pagan? Be warned, nearly every single character will receive an event that converts their religion and that of their personal demesne. This may bring older computers to their knees. This is an unsupported feature primarily for development use!
